name: Video Streaming App (Twitch clone) – Next.js App
description: I developed a video streaming web application using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn-ui library, Prisma ORM, Postgres SQL database, and livekit API for real-time streaming and community interaction.

name: E-commerce Webapp – MERN Project
description: I developed a feature-rich E-commerce web application utilizing the MERN stack with user authentication, secure payment processing using Stripe, and email services for product updates.

name: Employee Management System – React + SpringBoot
description: Built a full stack application for managing employee data with authenticated, authorized roles using React.js, Spring Boot, and MySQL.

name: VMA Associates – Next.js App : Freelance
description: Created VMA Associates, a business website using Next.js as a freelance developer.

name: Shop for Home – Online eComm App – Angular + Spring Boot
description: Developed a full-stack E-commerce application using Angular, Spring Boot, and PostgreSQL during an internship at Wipro-Velocity. Also gained experience in deploying the application on AWS.
